SEARCH
Package fr.cs.group12.myFoodora.meal

Class Meal

java.lang.Object
fr.cs.group12.myFoodora.meal.Meal
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullMeal, HalfMeal, SpecialMeal
public class Meal extends Object
The Meal class represents a meal consisting of multiple menu items. It includes information about the meal's name, items, discount factor, and whether it is vegetarian or gluten-free.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a Meal with the specified name, menu items, and discount factor.
